messages.message: LICENSE This software is free for use and redistribution while including this license notice, unless: 1. is used for commercial or non-personal purposes, or 2. used for a product which includes or associated with a blockchain or other decentralized database technology, or 3. used for a product which includes or associated with the issuance or use of cryptographic or electronic currencies/coins/tokens. On all of the mentioned cases, an explicit and written permission is required from the Author (Ohad Asor). Contact ohad@idni.org for requesting a permission. This license may be modified over time by the Author.
Name is required and can consist of a-zA-Z0-9_+-/*
